alert.note: Alert for Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:25AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Burke, Richmond, southwestern Barnwell and western Aiken Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1024 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Fort Gordon to near Gough. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Waynesboro, Savannah River Site, Aiken Mall, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Plant Vogtle, Clearwater, Belvedere, Martinez, Hephzibah, New Ellenton, Jackson, Midville, Glendale, Gough, South Augusta, Midtown and Summerville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 195 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 21. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
